name: NWBonjourServiceEndpoint
desc: A network endpoint specified as a Bonjour service name, type, and domain.

items.name: init(name: String, type: String, domain: String)
items.desc: Create an endpoint with a Bonjour service name, type, and domain. All fields must be specified.

items.name: var type: String
items.desc: The endpoint's Bonjour service type, such as "_music._tcp".

items.name: var domain: String
items.desc: The endpoint's Bonjour service domain, such as "local".
